verbose_text: When we are preparing the manuscript, Morozko et al. published the ILDR1 null mouse model, which show the similar phenotypes as ours We observed expression of ILDR1 in hair cells in the organ of Corti of P2, P5, and P10 mice (XREF_FIG) and found that ILDR1 was highly expressed in auditory sensory cells and regions indicating that ILDR1 might have a functional role in hearing.
